languages.text: "В вопросах штурма чем короче позывной, тем меньше шанс, что тебя пристрелят, пока его выговариваешь. Но воля ваша, Имперский орел".
"In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
languages.original_text: "В вопросах штурма чем короче позывной, тем меньше шанс, что тебя пристрелят, пока его выговариваешь. Но воля ваша, Имперский орел".

traits.locale_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
"In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
"In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
"In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
"In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

languages.text: «En un asalto táctico, cuando más breve sea el código, menos probable es recibir un disparo mientras se pronuncia. Pero la decisión es suya, Águila del Emperador».
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: «En un asalto táctico, cuando más breve sea el código, menos probable es recibir un disparo mientras se pronuncia. Pero la decisión es suya, Águila del Emperador».

languages.text: “战术突袭的过程中，代号越短，就越不容易在喊代号期间被敌人击中。不过，就按你的意思来吧，帝皇之鹰。”
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: “战术突袭的过程中，代号越短，就越不容易在喊代号期间被敌人击中。不过，就按你的意思来吧，帝皇之鹰。”

languages.text: « Lors d'un assaut tactique, plus les noms de code sont brefs, moins nous avons de risques de nous faire tirer dessus le temps de les prononcer. Mais puisque vous y tenez, va pour l'Aigle de l'Empereur. »
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: « Lors d'un assaut tactique, plus les noms de code sont brefs, moins nous avons de risques de nous faire tirer dessus le temps de les prononcer. Mais puisque vous y tenez, va pour l'Aigle de l'Empereur. »

languages.text: 「戦略的襲撃では、呼出符号が短ければ短いほど、それを発している間に撃たれる可能性は低くなります。しかし、勝手にしてください、皇帝の鷲よ」
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: 「戦略的襲撃では、呼出符号が短ければ短いほど、それを発している間に撃たれる可能性は低くなります。しかし、勝手にしてください、皇帝の鷲よ」

languages.text: "Taktik taarruzda kod adı ne kadar kısa olursa onu söylediğiniz sırada vurulma ihtimaliniz de o kadar düşük olur. Tabii siz nasıl dilerseniz öyle olsun İmparator'un Kartalı."
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: "Taktik taarruzda kod adı ne kadar kısa olursa onu söylediğiniz sırada vurulma ihtimaliniz de o kadar düşük olur. Tabii siz nasıl dilerseniz öyle olsun İmparator'un Kartalı."

languages.text: "Je kürzer bei einem taktischen Angriff die Rufzeichen sind, desto geringer ist die Gefahr, erschossen zu werden, während man sie durchgibt. Aber gut, dann eben Emperor's Eagle."
languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."

traits.locale_text: "Je kürzer bei einem taktischen Angriff die Rufzeichen sind, desto geringer ist die Gefahr, erschossen zu werden, während man sie durchgibt. Aber gut, dann eben Emperor's Eagle."

languages.original_text: "In a tactical assault, the shorter the call sign, the lower your chances of getting shot while you're saying it. But so be it, Emperor's Eagle."
